text: The mayor, prior to the final adoption of such map or maps, shall afford to all persons interested a full opportunity to be heard respecting such map or maps and the acquisition of the real estate shown thereon, and shall give public notice of such hearing, by publishing a notice, once in each week, for three successive weeks in the City Record, and in two papers published in the county or counties in which the real estate to be acquired or affected is situated, and in two daily papers in the city. At such hearing or hearings, testimony may be produced by the parties appearing before it in such manner as the mayor may determine, and he or she is hereby authorized to administer oaths and issue subpoenas in any such proceeding pending before him or her.
